response.overview: A documentary that presents the Asia Minor Catastrophe of 1922 through oral testimonies of eyewitnesses. It constitutes research into the life of the Hellenism of the East before the catastrophe, the causes of the Catastrophe, as well as the lives of the refugees in Greece, their contribution to the economic sector, and the painful process of their integration into Greek society. Lastly, there are narratives about the Asia Minor Campaign as experienced by eyewitnesses.
response.title: The Asia Minor Catastrophe
